name: editor
description: A plain text editor, built with Prosemirror

scripts.clear: mkdir -p dist && rm -rf dist/* && cp public/* dist
scripts.dev: npm run clear && esbuild src/index.ts src/style.css --bundle --sourcemap --outdir=dist && npx serve -l 3000 dist
scripts.build: npm run clear && esbuild src/index.ts src/style.css --bundle --minify --outdir=dist
